subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Frank / Friends
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Thanks!
 Incase anyone is wondering, Rick lives about two blocks from me, that's how
he rates a box.

 Yeah, it can be amazing at times. I had a box running random sweep mode
tonight, and as my daughter in-law pulled into the drive way "Hi Dad" came
out of the box, which is her usual greetting. Random seems to have some
merit, it wiol pick up thought, since we are all sprit that shouldn't be
surprising.  but it's a real pain to get it to work stable.

 Frank-S

On Fri, Aug 13, 2010 at 12:42 PM, Rick Wegrzyn <rickwegrzyn@...>wrote:

>
>
>  I've been investigating for 33 years...The day I got that "BOX" really
> changed things...I don't take everything I hear as spirit,if  I catch it on
> EVP and it's clear I'll take it under my wing for some sort of response,BUT
> on the other hand We're getting our names called and asnwers to "Do You Know
> Where You Are ?" An d the response made us stop and wonder...reponse was "In
> the basement"......HELLO we're in the Basement......Also I believe it will
> bring out the EVIL SIDE...which we did..and both my house as well as our
> partners seems to have someone that has followed us,turning on lights in the
> kitchen and opening the kitchen cabinets up,It made me feel sick all day and
> affected our cat...not to mention simular things at our partners home...Be
> careful what you say and ask for...cause you might get more than you
> want.....Love Ya Frank....Rick
>
>  
>

Thanks!
